description: Go Pro - Get CLE Webinar Access & Justia Chat

When you upgrade to Justia Connect Pro, you unlock access to exclusive Justia Webinars with CLE credit available for select live and on-demand programs. This is one of the many benefits of Justia Connect Pro. We recently added Justia Chat for Justia Connect Pro members as well. Having Justia Chat on your Justia Lawyer Directory Profile can boost your chances of getting even more potential clients from your enhanced profile!
